taskList.title: Documentation

taskList.title: Finalize Project
taskList.description: Review all aspects of the project and prepare for the final release.

taskList.title: Complete Project Proposal
taskList.description: Draft a detailed project proposal outlining goals, scope, and deliverables.

taskList.title: Revise User Interface
taskList.description: Gather feedback on the prototype and make necessary revisions to the user interface.
taskList.author: mock

taskList.title: Client Presentation
taskList.description: Prepare a presentation for the client showcasing the project progress and features.
taskList.author: mock

taskList.title: Research Market Trends
taskList.description: Conduct market research to identify current trends and customer preferences.
taskList.author: mock

taskList.title: Code Refactoring
taskList.description: Optimize and refactor existing codebase to improve performance and maintainability.
taskList.author: mock

taskList.title: Develop Prototype
taskList.description: Create a prototype for the new product feature based on the research findings.
taskList.author: mock

taskList.title: Quality Assurance Testing
taskList.description: Conduct thorough testing to ensure the product meets quality standards.
taskList.author: mock

taskList.title: Project Kickoff
taskList.description: Hold a meeting to officially start the project.
taskList.author: mock

taskList.title: Release Version 1.0
